alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 8:17PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Green Lake, western Fond du Lac and northwestern Dodge Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 817 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ripon to near Waupun to near Beaver Dam. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaver Dam, Waupun, Ripon, Markesan, Rosendale, Green Lake, Brandon, Burnett, Fox Lake, Alto, Fairwater, Atwater, Astico, Lagoda, South Beaver Dam and West Rosendale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake
